game_info.name: X-COM Classic Clone
game_info.description: Turn-based tactical strategy. Control soldiers with Time Units (TU), manage actions (move, shoot, crouch), fight aliens in fog-of-war combat with reaction fire system.

core_loop.description: Select soldier -> Spend TU on actions (move/shoot/crouch) -> End turn -> Alien turn with reaction fire -> Repeat until all aliens killed or soldiers dead

primary_action.description: Click enemy to target for shooting

combat_profile.how_to_attack: Select soldier, click enemy to target, choose shot type (1=snap, 2=aimed, 3=auto). Each shot costs TU%. Crouching improves accuracy. End turn when done.
